description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. An energized Match 3 game with a slight problem. Just when you think you have everything under control, a mischievous monkey jumps in to induce disorder. 30 levels of fun and aggravation await you deep in the heart of the jungle. Venture all the way through and you will truly deserve the title "King of the Jungle". Let's get monkified.
